text:
@Jim_Jordan @realDonaldTrump No wonder politicians are continually blaming/second-guessing each other during this crisis. The CDC/scientific/medical community has been giving us all wrong or inconsistent “scientific” info from the beginning, yet we keep changing our lives over it.

https://t.co/k57Muiua2E
